meanings.definition: To give a new name to something.
meanings.sent1: She is renaming her cat to Fluffy.
meanings.sent2: I am renaming my favorite book to 'Adventure Time'.
meanings.sent3: The renaming of the street caused confusion for the delivery drivers.
meanings.sent4: By renaming the project, they breathed new life into it.
meanings.sent5: The act of renaming can bring a fresh perspective to familiar things.

meanings.definition: The act of changing the name of something.
meanings.sent1: The renaming of the company was a big decision.
meanings.sent2: I found out about the renaming of the park through the news.
meanings.sent3: The renaming ceremony was a grand event with music and speeches.
meanings.sent4: The renaming of the ship brought bad luck, according to superstition.
meanings.sent5: The renaming of the street to 'Sunshine Avenue' brought smiles to the residents.
